Subclasses of SecureRandom in com.sun.spot.security.implementation
 class PseudoRand
          Implements a pseudo random number generator. * Warning: This method is not part of the Security and Trust Services API (SATSA) 1.0 specification.
 

Methods in com.sun.spot.security.implementation that return SecureRandom

          Creates a RandomData instance of the selected algorithm.
